body:
Mostapha,

You may have to simplify your mesh or output it at lower resolution and/or tile it as Rob Guglielmetti suggested.

You can also try increasing some #define's in common/object.h, such as MAXOBJBLK then rebuilding everything using makeall.

-Greg

Sent from my iPad
